response.content:
{
  "step1": "Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease two 8-inch round pans and line with parchment paper for easy cake release and cleanup.",
  "step2": "Mix 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup granulated sugar, 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, and 1 teaspoon baking powder in a large bowl.",
  "step3": "In another bowl, whisk 1/2 cup whole milk, 2 large eggs, and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract until well combined and smooth.",
  "step4": "Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix until just combined, being careful not to overmix the batter.",
  "step5": "Divide batter evenly between prepared pans and bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean.",
  "step6": "Let cakes cool in pans for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely, then frost with your favorite chocolate frosting."
}
